News.headline: Kids For A Quid: Dagenham & Redbridge v Gateshead
News.page_title: Kids For A Quid: Dagenham & Redbridge v Gateshead
News.URL_keywords: Kids For A Quid: Dagenham & Redbridge v Gateshead
News.short_description: Tickets for the Daggers home clash against Gateshead are now on sale, with the game being a Kids for a Quid match.
News.description:
Gateshead visit The Chigwell Construction Stadium on Saturday 12th November, with a 3:00pm kick off.

Junior (10-16) tickets can be purchased for just £1.00 in the Terrace, and £2.00 for seated tickets for the game and Under-10s are FREE if purchased in advance of matchday with an adult equivalent.

Please note that reduced prices for Juniors are in advance only and will go back to normal prices on the day.

Full Ticket prices can be found here.

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop. 

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21 
Club shop: Opening Times
